mainBoard.name: Kumena's Speaker
mainBoard.originalText: Kumena's Speaker gets +1/+1 as long as you control another Merfolk or an Island.

rulings.text: Because damage remains marked on a creature until it’s removed as the turn ends, the damage Kumena’s Speaker takes during combat may become lethal if you no longer control a Merfolk or Island later in the turn.
Kumena’s Speaker gets only +1/+1 from its ability, no matter how many Merfolk and Islands you control.

Most nonbasic lands that produce blue mana aren’t Islands. For example, Glacial Fortress isn’t an Island. Some nonbasic lands (such as Irrigated Farmland from the Amonkhet set) do have basic land types printed on the type line and may be Islands.

mainBoard.text: Kumena's Speaker gets +1/+1 as long as you control another Merfolk or an Island.

mainBoard.name: Waker of the Wilds
mainBoard.originalText: {X}{G}{G}: Put X +1/+1 counters on target land you control. That land becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.

rulings.text: If the ability targets a land that’s already a creature, that land creature’s base power and toughness will become 0/0, overwriting its previous base power and toughness. Other effects that modify its power and/or toughness (including any +1/+1 counters that were on it) will continue to apply.
The land-animation effect lasts indefinitely. It doesn’t wear off during the cleanup step or when you lose control of Waker of the Wilds.

foreignData.flavorText: « Imaginez ce qui nous attend au tournant. L'aventure. La découverte. La fortune qui nous tend les bras. C'est pour tout ça que je prends la mer. » —Capitaine Lanneray Tempeste
foreignData.name: Rivages inconnus
foreignData.text:
{T} : Ajoutez {C} à votre réserve.
{1}, {T} : Ajoutez un mana de la couleur de votre choix à votre réserve.

foreignData.flavorText: "Immaginate cosa ci aspetta oltre la prossima insenatura: avventure, scoperte, ricchezze in attesa di essere conquistate. È per questo che solco i mari." —Capitana Lannery Fendiburrasca
foreignData.name: Coste Sconosciute
foreignData.text:
{T}: Aggiungi {C} alla tua riserva di mana.
{1}, {T}: Aggiungi un mana di un qualsiasi colore alla tua riserva di mana.

foreignData.flavorText: 「その先に何が待っているのか想像する。冒険。発見。取り放題の富。だから私は船に乗っているのよ。」 ――風雲船長ラネリー
foreignData.name: 未知の岸
foreignData.text:
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{C}を加える。
{1}, {T}：あなたのマナ・プールに、好きな色１色のマナ１点を加える。

foreignData.flavorText: "저 모퉁이를 돌면 무엇이 기다리고 있을지 상상해 봐라. 모험, 발견, 막대한 재물. 이게 내가 항해하는 이유지." —래너리 스톰 선장
foreignData.name: 미지의 해안
foreignData.text:
{T}: {C}를 당신의 마나풀에 담는다.
{1}, {T}: 원하는 색의 마나 한 개를 당신의 마나풀에 담는다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Apenas imagine o que nos aguarda depois da curva. Aventuras. Descobertas. Riquezas. É por isso que eu navego." — Capitã Lannery Tormenta
foreignData.name: Litorais Desconhecidos
foreignData.text:
{T}: Adicione {C} à sua reserva de mana.
{1}, {T}: Adicione um mana de qualquer cor à sua reserva de mana.

foreignData.flavorText: «Только представь, что ждет нас за изгибом реки. Приключения. Открытия. Сокровища. Вот ради чего я выхожу в плаванье». — капитан Ланнери Шторм
foreignData.name: Неведомые Берега
foreignData.text:
{T}: добавьте {C} в ваше хранилище маны.
{1}, {T}: добавьте одну ману любого цвета в ваше хранилище маны.

foreignData.flavorText: 「想像一下驶过弯后可能出现什么。冒险。发现。取之不尽的财富。这便是我扬帆起航的原因。」 ～兰娜莉速腾船长
foreignData.name: 无闻海岸
foreignData.text:
{T}：加{C}到你的法术力池中。
{1}，{T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。

foreignData.flavorText: 「想像一下駛過彎後可能出現什麼。冒險。發現。取之不盡的財富。這便是我揚帆起航的原因。」 ～蘭娜莉速騰船長
foreignData.name: 無聞海岸

{1}，{T}：加一點任意顏色的魔法力到你的魔法力池中。
